MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK8 postcode area of Stirling. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area today and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site at the Barn Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:54pm on Friday, 04 December 2020
